mapper.insert: insert into VTProberCard.Probercard_Info(prober_card_id, cust_name, cust_no, receipt_time, vendor_name, vendor_no, belong_dept, use_equipment, dut_count, pin_count, cab_position, card_source, pm_td, card_type, new_old, clean_type, pinlen_spec, pindiam_spec, pinlevel_spec, pindepth_spec, td_total, card_model, release_flag,glass_mask,mylar_mask,note,rebuild_count,creator,confirmer) value (#{proberCardId},#{custName},#{custNo},#{receiptTime},#{vendorName},#{vendorNo},#{belongDept},#{useEquipment},#{dutCount},#{pinCount},#{cabPosition},#{cardSource},#{pmTd},#{cardType},#{newOld},#{cleanType},#{pinlenSpec},#{pindiamSpec},#{pinlevelSpec},#{pindepthSpec},#{tdTotal},#{cardModel},#{releaseFlag},#{glassMask},#{mylarMask},#{note},#{rebuildCount},#{creator},#{confirmer});
mapper.select: SELECT prober_card_id,last_process,current_process,update_operator FROM VTProberCard.ProberCard_Current_State ;

select prober_card_id, cust_name, cust_no, receipt_time, vendor_name, vendor_no, belong_dept, use_equipment, dut_count, pin_count, cab_position, card_source, pm_td, card_type, new_old, clean_type, pinlen_spec, pindiam_spec, pinlevel_spec, pindepth_spec, td_total, card_model, release_flag,glass_mask,mylar_mask,note,rebuild_count,creator,confirmer from VTProberCard.Probercard_Info
select * from VTProberCard.Probercard_Info where prober_card_id=#{cardId};
mapper.insert: insert into ProberCard_IQC_Record(prober_card_id, pin_maxlen, pin_minlen, pin_maxdiam, pin_mindiam, pin_level,pin_depth,update_operator,last_process,next_station,note) value (#{proberCardId},#{pinMaxlen},#{pinMinlen},#{pinMaxdiam},#{pinMindiam},#{pinLevel},#{pinDepth},#{updateOperator},#{lastProcess},#{nextStation},#{note});
mapper.select: select current_process from ProberCard_Current_State where prober_card_id=#{proberCardId};
mapper.update: update VTProberCard.ProberCard_Current_State set last_process =#{odlStatus} ,current_process=#{NewStatus},update_operator=#{operator} where prober_card_id=#{proberCardId} and current_process=#{odlStatus};
mapper.select: select prober_card_id, pte_operator, card_yield, card_operator, pin_marks, release_flag, update_operator, note from ProberCard_Release_Record where prober_card_id=#{proberCardId}
mapper.insert:
insert into ProberCard_Release_Record(prober_card_id, pte_operator, card_yield, card_operator, pin_marks, release_flag, update_operator, note) value (#{proberCardId},#{pteOperator},#{cardYield},#{cardOperator},#{pinMarks},#{releaseFlag},#{updateOperator},#{note}) on duplicate key update
pte_operator=#{pteOperator},
card_yield=#{cardYield},
card_operator=#{cardOperator},
pin_marks=#{pinMarks},
release_flag=#{releaseFlag},
update_operator=#{updateOperator},
note=#{note},
mapper.update: update VTProberCard.Probercard_Info set cust_name =#{custName} ,cust_no=#{custNo},receipt_time=#{receiptTime},vendor_name =#{vendorName} ,vendor_no=#{vendorNo},belong_dept=#{belongDept},use_equipment =#{useEquipment} ,dut_count=#{dutCount},pin_count=#{pinCount},cab_position =#{cabPosition} ,card_source=#{cardSource},pm_td=#{pmTd}, card_type =#{cardType} ,new_old=#{newOld},clean_type=#{cleanType},pinlen_spec =#{pinlenSpec} ,pindiam_spec=#{pindiamSpec},pinlevel_spec=#{pinlevelSpec},pindepth_spec =#{pindepthSpec} ,td_total=#{tdTotal},card_model=#{cardModel},release_flag =#{releaseFlag} ,glass_mask=#{glassMask},mylar_mask=#{mylarMask},note=#{note},rebuild_count=#{rebuildCount},creator=#{creator},confirmer=#{confirmer} where prober_card_id=#{proberCardId};
mapper.select: select release_flag from VTProberCard.ProberCard_Release_Record where prober_card_id=#{proberCardId};
mapper.update: update VTProberCard.ProberCard_Release_Record set release_flag=#{ releaseFlag } where prober_card_id=#{proberCardId};
update VTProberCard.Probercard_Info set release_flag=#{ releaseFlag } where prober_card_id=#{proberCardId};
update VTProberCard.ProberCard_Current_State set current_process=#{ currentProcess } where prober_card_id=#{proberCardId};
mapper.select: SELECT prober_card_id,pin_maxlen,pin_minlen,pin_maxdiam,pin_mindiam,pin_level,pin_depth,update_operator,note,next_station,last_process FROM VTProberCard.ProberCard_IQC_Record ;

SELECT prober_card_id,before_pinlen,after_pinlen,before_pindiam,after_pindiam,before_pinlevel,after_pinlevel,clean_flag,grinding_flag,corrosion_flag,adjustment_flag,adjustment_flag,bake_flag,handgrind_flag,checksolder_flag,maintsolder_flag,checkparts_flag,changeparts_flag,jumper_flag,update_operator,note,next_station,rebuild_count FROM VTProberCard.ProberCard_Maintain_Record ;
mapper.update: update VTProberCard.Probercard_Info set pinlen_spec=#{ pinlenSpec },pindiam_spec=#{pindiamSpec},pinlevel_spec=#{pinlevelSpec},rebuild_count=#{rebuildCount} where prober_card_id=#{proberCardId};
update VTProberCard.ProberCard_Maintain_Record set after_pinlen=#{ afterPinlen },after_pindiam=#{afterPindiam},after_pinlevel=#{afterPinlevel} where prober_card_id=#{proberCardId};
update VTProberCard.ProberCard_IQC_Record set pin_minlen=#{ pinMinlen },pin_maxdiam=#{pinMaxdiam},pin_level=#{pinLevel} where prober_card_id=#{proberCardId};
mapper.select: SELECT rebuild_Count FROM VTProberCard.Probercard_Info where prober_card_id=#{proberCardId}
{call pro_GetCardTouchInfo()}
mapper.insert: insert into VTProberCard.Probercard_Extension_Info(prober_card_id, use_equipment, dut_count, pin_count, curr_td, td_total, card_type, pin_len, pin_diam, pin_level, exten_count, last_process, marks_flag, card_yield, exten_flag, note, current_process, creator, load_time) value (#{proberCardId},#{useEquipment},#{dutCount},#{pinCount},#{currTd},#{tdTotal},#{cardType},#{pinLen},#{pinDiam},#{pinLevel},#{extenCount},#{lastProcess},#{marksFlag},#{cardYield},#{extenFlag},#{note},#{currentProcess},#{creator},#{loadTime});
mapper.select: {call pro_GetCardExten()}
{call pro_GetCardExtenSingle(#{proberCardId,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR})}
